title: The Road Ahead
lyrics:
[Verse 1: single strum] 
(G)  One man on an island
(C)  One drop in the sea
(Am)All it takes to set a wave in (D)motion
(G)Is a single word, an action
(C)A hope that we can be
The (Am)change that we've been longing to (D)see

[Pre-chorus:]
For our (C)home, our (D)land, our (G)fami(Em)ly
It's (C)all within our (D build up)reach

[Chorus]
See this (G)island, (C)every grain of sand
Hear this (Am)anthem, it's the (D)voices of our (G)friends
Come what(G)ever on the (D)road a(Em)head
We did it (Am)before, (D) and we'll do it (G)again

[Verse 2:]
When the (G)moments turn to hours
And the (C)day's last light is gone
(Am)Look around us always and (D)remember
There were (G)times we were uncertain
But we (C)just kept walking on
It's (Am)always darkest just before the (D)dawn

[Chorus]
See this (G)island, (C)every grain of sand
Hear this (Am)anthem, it's the (D)voices of our (G)friends
Come what(G)ever on the (D)road a(Em)head
We did it (Am)before, (D) and we'll do it (G)again

[Bridge]
(Em)Our home, the (G)home we share
Where the (Am)garden always (D)grows toward the (G)light
Though the (C)road ahead is (G)daunting
I (Am)know we're gonna be (D)alright

[Chorus: single strum]
See this (G)island, (C)every grain of sand
Hear this (Am)anthem, it's the (D)voices of our (G)friends
Come what(G)ever on the (D)road a(Em)head
We did it (Am)before, (D) and we'll do it (G build up)again

[Chorus + outro]
See this (G)island, (C)every grain of sand
Hear this (Am)anthem, it's the (D)voices of our (G)friends
Come what(G)ever on the (D)road a(Em)head
We did it (Am)before (D) (C) (D) and we'll do it (G)again
